sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Badge, Spinner, Nav, Tab } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import ReportList from '../reports/ReportList'; import api from '../../services/api'; const UserDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalReports: 0, pendingReports: 0, resolvedReports: 0 }); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all'); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchStats = async () => { try { const response = await api.get('/reports/stats'); setStats(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to fetch stats:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchStats(); }, []); return ( {/* Dashboard Header */}

Welcome, {user?.name || 'User'}!

Report and track issues in your campus

 {/* Stats Cards */}

{loading ? : stats.totalReports}

Total Reports

{loading ? : stats.pendingReports}

Pending Reports

{loading ? : stats.resolvedReports}

Resolved Reports

 {/* Reports Section */}

Your Reports

 {/* Filter Tabs */} setActiveTab(k)}>
All Reports Pending In Progress Resolved
{/* Quick Actions */}
); }; export default UserDashboard;
